source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.4 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of your Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!. Free Ferocious Bites are exempt from this chance.

Set: When you consume Apex Predator's Craving, become a Big Winner, dealing 1 million Physical damage to Apex Predator's primary target and increasing the damage of your periodic effects by 16% for 6 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shoulderguards of the Assembly

spells.description:
Use: Summon an Earthen Delivery Drill to dig for an assortment of battleground buffs.

The drill lasts for 28 sec and can only be summoned while in combat. Can only be used in unrated battlegrounds and in War Mode on Khaz Algar. (15 Min Cooldown)

Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Agility by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.
